names.english: decoction to eliminate wind and clear dryness
names.commonEnglish: Decoction to Eliminate Wind and Clear Dryness

actions: Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood.
With Bai Shao, for Blood Deficiency Heat.
Dispels Wind-Dampness, unblocks the channels and alleviates pain.
Releases the Exterior and expels External Wind.
With Ku Shen and Chan Tui, for urticaria and skin itch.
Disperses Wind, clears Heat, vents rashes and relieves itching.
Drains Fire and resolves Fire toxicity.
With Huang Qi, drains pathogenic Heat from the Upper and Middle Jiaos.
Drains Heat, generates Fluids, relieves toxicity, expels pus and reduces swelling.
Clears Heat, disperses Wind, kills parasites and stops itching.
Nourishes the Blood and astringes Yin.
Clears Heat, cools the Blood and nourishes Yin.
With Bai Shao, for Blood Deficiency Heat.
Drains Fire and detoxifies.
Clears Heat in the Qi Stage, drains Fire, relieves irritability, quenches thirst and heals eczema, burns and ulcerated sores and wounds.
With Sheng Di Huang, for excessive Fire with injured fluids.
Clears Heat, relieves Fire toxicity, moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs and guides the herbs to all twelve channels.
Expels Wind
Clears Heat
Nourishes Yin and Blood

symptoms: The lesions have a slightly erythematous base
The scales are dry and powdery
The scales may be very thick on the scalp
